meanings.definition: The act of making something neat or attractive by cutting away or removing excess material.
meanings.sent1: She did a great job with the trimming on the bushes in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The barber did a quick trimming of his hair to make it look tidy.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the trimming of its fur was unnecessary, but it felt lighter afterwards.
meanings.sent4: The trimming of the overgrown tree branches revealed a beautiful view of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The tailor's precise trimming of the fabric transformed the dress into a stunning gown.

meanings.definition: A decorative addition or embellishment, especially on clothing or furniture.
meanings.sent1: The gold trimming on the dress made it look elegant and luxurious.
meanings.sent2: The antique chair had intricate trimming along its edges.
meanings.sent3: The clown's costume had colorful trimming that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The trimming on the wedding cake was so intricate, it looked like lace.
meanings.sent5: The Christmas tree sparkled with silver trimming and twinkling lights.
